title: The Badminton Horse Trials
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: A record of the three-day event at the 1962 Badminton Horse Trials, showing famous riders and their mounts in training and the preparations made for transport and stabling. Events include dressage, cross country steeple chasing and show jumping. the Queen attends and presents prizes.
